name: S Gautam
headerTaglineThree: developer, data analyst and UI/UX designer

projects.title: Checklist Application using Sveltekit
projects.description: My personal project is a checklist application developed using SvelteKit, a lightweight framework for building web applications The application is designed to be responsive and accessible, with a clean and user-friendly interface. It utilizes modern web technologies to provide a fast and seamless experience to the users.

projects.title: Threejs website
projects.description: My Three.js website is an interactive web application that uses the Three.js library to create 3D graphics and animations. The website offers a unique user experience, with stunning visuals and engaging animations. It features a variety of interactive elements such as clickable objects, animations triggered by user interactions, and responsive controls that allow users to navigate the 3D environment. The website is optimized for performance, with efficient rendering and minimal load times, ensuring a smooth and seamless experience for the users.

projects.title: Spotify EDA
projects.description: For my personal project, I conducted an in-depth EDA of a large dataset of Spotify songs. Using Python and data analysis libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, and Matplotlib, I explored the dataset to gain insights into the characteristics of popular songs on the platform. I examined the relationship between attributes and popularity. Through this project, I gained experience in data preprocessing, EDA, and data visualization. It allowed me to showcase my abilities in data analysis and further developed my passion for working with data.

projects.title: Agro Product Management System
projects.description: Built a website that aims to connect farmers, wholesalers and customers. I was responsible for implementing the SQL queries and structures. The project used MySQL, Flask, Python along with other front end technologies.

projects.title: 2048 Android Game
projects.description: Developed a 2048 game using native Java. The game allows the users to play and record the score. It also has the feature of leaderboard.

projects.title: UX Portfolio
projects.description: My UX portfolio consists of two case studies, one focusing on web design and the other on mobile app design. These case studies showcase my skills and experience in user research, information architecture, wireframing, prototyping, and user testing. I have included detailed explanations of my design process, including the challenges I faced and how I overcame them. Through these case studies, I aim to demonstrate my ability to create user-centered designs that meet business objectives and provide a positive user experience.

services.title: Svelte
services.description: Svelte is a modern JavaScript framework that allows for building highly optimized, reactive web applications with a small footprint.

services.title: Threejs
services.description: Three.js is a versatile JavaScript library for creating dynamic, interactive 3D graphics on the web.

services.title: React
services.description: React is a popular JavaScript library for building efficient and scalable user interfaces with a component-based architecture.

services.title: UX/UI
services.description: UX/UI design is the process of creating user-centered interfaces that prioritize usability, accessibility, and user satisfaction.

services.title: Data Analysis
services.description: Data analytics is the process of collecting, processing, and analyzing large data sets to extract meaningful insights and inform data-driven decision making.

services.title: Unreal Engine
services.description: Unreal Engine is a versatile game engine used for creating immersive and interactive experiences across various platforms, with advanced graphics and visual scripting tools.

services.title: C++
services.description: C++ is a high-performance, object-oriented programming language widely used for developing system software, video games, and other performance-critical applications.

services.title: Python
services.description: Python is a versatile and easy-to-learn programming language, known for its simplicity, readability, and wide range of applications, including web development, scientific computing, data analysis, artificial intelligence, and automation.

aboutpara: Web development intern with experience in developing web applications using React, Node.js, Sveltekit, and Three.js. Experienced in working with clients to understand their requirements. Knowledgeable in game development, UX/UI design, and data analysis.
